subject: Getting credit when others actually use your methods
body:
Your students and collaborators probably recreate L-function moment calculations from your papers rather than reusing your actual implementationsâ€”dependency issues, cluster-specific setup, etc.

I built Ouro to fix this: an API layer over computational workflows that lets others call your methods directly. You get credit through visible usage metrics, not just citations.

Would you be open to a quick chat in January?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
